Batcher.title: batcher_batched_transactions
Batcher.description: Counter of batched transactions across all forks

Consensus.title: consensus_block_number
Consensus.description: The block number consensus is working to decide

Consensus.title: consensus_round
Consensus.description: The round of the state machine

Consensus.title: consensus_max_cached_block_number
Consensus.description: How many blocks after current are cached

Consensus.title: consensus_cached_votes
Consensus.description: How many votes are cached when starting to work on a new block number

Consensus.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_consensus
Consensus.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of consensus

Consensus.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_sync
Consensus.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of sync

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_received
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals received

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_valid_init
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals received with a valid init

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_validated
Consensus.description: The total number of complete, valid proposals received

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_invalid
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals that failed validation

Consensus.title: consensus_build_proposal_total
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals built

Consensus.title: consensus_build_proposal_failed
Consensus.description: The number of proposals that failed to be built

Consensus.title: consensus_reproposals
Consensus.description: The number of reproposals sent

Consensus.title: consensus_new_value_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has attained a lock on a new value

Consensus.title: consensus_held_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus progressed to a new round while holding a lock

Consensus.title: consensus_timeouts
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has timed out

Consensus.title: consensus_num_batches_in_proposal
Consensus.description: The number of transaction batches in a valid proposal received

Consensus.title: consensus_num_txs_in_proposal
Consensus.description: The total number of individual transactions in a valid proposal received

Consensus.title: consensus_l2_gas_price
Consensus.description: The L2 gas price calculated in an accepted proposal

Consensus.title: cende_last_prepared_blob_block_number
Consensus.description: The blob block number that cende knows. That means the sequencer can be the proposer only if the current height is greater by one than this value.

Consensus.title: cende_prepare_blob_for_next_height_latency
Consensus.description: The time it takes to prepare the blob for the next height, i.e create the blob object.

Consensus.title: cende_write_prev_height_blob_latency
Consensus.description: Be careful with this metric, if the blob was already written by another request, the latency is much lower since wirting to Aerospike is not needed.

MempoolP2p.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_connected_peers
MempoolP2p.description: The number of connected peers to the mempool p2p component

MempoolP2p.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_sent_messages
MempoolP2p.description: The number of messages sent by the mempool p2p component

MempoolP2p.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_received_messages
MempoolP2p.description: The number of messages received by the mempool p2p component

MempoolP2p.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_broadcasted_transaction_batch_size
MempoolP2p.description: The number of transactions in batches broadcast by the mempool p2p component

ConsensusP2p.title: apollo_consensus_num_connected_peers
ConsensusP2p.description: The number of connected peers to the consensus p2p component

ConsensusP2p.title: apollo_consensus_votes_num_sent_messages
ConsensusP2p.description: The number of messages sent by the consensus p2p component over the Votes topic

ConsensusP2p.title: apollo_consensus_votes_num_received_messages
ConsensusP2p.description: The number of messages received by the consensus p2p component over the Votes topic

ConsensusP2p.title: apollo_consensus_proposals_num_sent_messages
ConsensusP2p.description: The number of messages sent by the consensus p2p component over the Proposals topic

ConsensusP2p.title: apollo_consensus_proposals_num_received_messages
ConsensusP2p.description: The number of messages received by the consensus p2p component over the Proposals topic

StateSyncP2p.title: apollo_central_sync_num_connected_peers
StateSyncP2p.description: The number of connected peers to the state sync p2p component

StateSyncP2p.title: apollo_central_sync_num_active_inbound_sessions
StateSyncP2p.description: The number of inbound sessions to the state sync p2p component

StateSyncP2p.title: apollo_central_sync_num_active_outbound_sessions
StateSyncP2p.description: The number of outbound sessions to the state sync p2p component

Gateway.title: gateway_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
Gateway.description: The rate of transactions received by the gateway during the last 20 minutes

Gateway.title: gateway_add_tx_latency
Gateway.description: Latency of gateway add_tx function in secs

Gateway.title: gateway_validate_tx_latency
Gateway.description: Latency of gateway validate function in secs

Gateway.title: gateway_transactions_sent_to_mempool
Gateway.description: Counter of transactions sent to the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_received
Mempool.description: Counter of transactions received by the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
Mempool.description: The rate of transactions received by the mempool during the last 20 minutes

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_dropped
Mempool.description: Counter of transactions dropped from the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_txs_committed
Mempool.description: The number of transactions that were committed to block

Mempool.title: mempool_pool_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the pool

Mempool.title: mempool_priority_queue_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the priority queue

Mempool.title: mempool_pending_queue_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the pending queue

Mempool.title: mempool_total_size_bytes
Mempool.description: The average total transaction size in bytes over time in the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_get_txs_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the get_txs

Mempool.title: mempool_delayed_declare_size
Mempool.description: The average number of delayed declare transactions

Mempool.title: mempool_transaction_time_spent
Mempool.description: The time (secs) that a transaction spent in the mempool

Apollo State Reader.title: class_cache_miss_ratio
Apollo State Reader.description: The ratio of cache misses when requesting compiled classes from the apollo state reader

Apollo State Reader.title: native_class_returned_ratio
Apollo State Reader.description: The ratio of Native classes returned by the apollo state reader
